wikipedia_page.main: Robert Kerr (born 16 November 1947 in Alexandria, Scotland) is a former football midfielder who captained Sunderland to victory in the 1973 FA Cup Final versus Leeds United

response: George's younger brother Bobby Kerr captained Sunderland to their famous 1973 FA Cup Final victory over Leeds United, whilst his elder brother Willie represented Scotland at youth level and played for Queen's Park F.C..Bell, Max (31st August 2020). Scunthorpe United: 20 Legends. Vertical Editions. pp.113-114.
* Bobby Kerr - former football midfielder who captained Sunderland to victory in the 1973 FA Cup Final
* Bobby Kerr (businessman) (born 1960), Irish entrepreneur and businessman
* Bobby Kerr (footballer, born 1929) (1929–2012), Scottish football forward for Darlington, Third Lanark, Stirling Albion and Greenock Morton
* Bobby Kerr (footballer, born 1947), Scottish football midfielder for Sunderland, Blackpool and Hartlepool United
